feed.title: Investbrain Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Investbrain: v1.0.4
entry.content:
Primarily this new release resolves the issues with multiple dividends being added for specific symbols (see #26).

What's Changed

  • fix: refresh dividends only once daily by @hackerESQ in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/30
  • Uses last dividend created date as start date instead of last dividend date by @hackerESQ in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/31
  • chore(deps-dev): bump axios from 1.7.3 to 1.7.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/16
  • chore(deps-dev): bump vite from 5.3.5 to 5.4.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/17
  • chore(deps): bump laravel/framework from 11.30.0 to 11.31.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/29

New Contributors

  • @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/16

Full Changelog: https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/compare/v1.0.3...v1.0.4

entry.title: New release for Investbrain: v1.0.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Adds pagination to recent activity list by @hackerESQ (see #24)
  • Remove terms checkbox for self hosted by @hackerESQ in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/32
  • Updated import / export section for docs by @hackerESQ
  • Make the system prompt aware of current date by @hackerESQ

Full Changelog: https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/compare/v1.0.4...v1.0.5

entry.title: New release for Investbrain: v1.0.6
entry.content:

  • feat: adds ollama support by @hackerESQ in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/36

Full Changelog: https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/compare/v1.0.5...v1.0.6

entry.title: New release for Investbrain: v1.0.7
entry.content: This release includes a small fix for the newly added Ollama support feature, which was released in v1.0.6.

entry.title: New release for Investbrain: v1.0.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Use the investbrainapp/investbrain docker image by @hackerESQ in https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/pull/44

Full Changelog: https://github.com/investbrainapp/investbrain/compare/v1.0.7...v1.0.8
